txt.en: 'An enemy of Angmar poses a great challenge to us. We must answer and hunt this ravager of the Free People down. Find them, collect their bounty and return to me.'\n\n<rgb=#00FF00>This quest will fail if there are no longer Glory Seeking Monster Players in the Ettenmoors.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Failure: There are no more available Glory-seekers</rgb>
Captain-General Tordúr wants you to hunt the glory-seeker of Angmar before they become too powerful. You will need to search throughout the Ettenmoors for this foe.
'Your efforts were necessary and should be celebrated. The foe you vanquished threatened to upend the battle in the Ettenmoors.\n\n'Thank you for your efforts.'

Among the enemies of Angmar is an audacious firebrand intent on slaughtering all that they can. Hunt them down and claim their bounty.\n\n<rgb=#00FF00>Only Glory Seeking Monster Players count toward the advance of this quest.</rgb>
You found and defeated an enemy of the Free People who vowed to slaughter as many as they could. You ended the reign of terror they would have wrought.
Speak with Captain-General Tordúr at Glân Vraig
